title: Poll: 'Latvia First' is first in Latvia
summary_full: The Latvia First (LPV) party has returned to the top of the party ratings, but the National Alliance has experienced the biggest drop. This is shown by the most recent survey of Latvian citizens conducted by the SKDS pollster in October, commissioned by Latvian Television.
